publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1758 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Small Towns Under Threat Conferenceâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Borders Council on its recent initiative to hold a conference on small towns under threat in Newton St Boswells on 17 September 2004 and notes that the conference will ensure that the issues facing Scottish small towns are highlighted and help to create a campaign for more support and investment in small towns and for the key role of small towns to be more fully recognised in public policy terms.
S2M-1758 Small Towns Under Threat Conference (lodged on 24 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1758 Small Towns Under Threat Conference (lodged on 24 September 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1758 Small Towns Under Threat Conference (lodged on 24 September 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1758 Small Towns Under Threat Conference (lodged on 24 September 2004) Donald Gorrie*
